s.text: Then it will try to deepen Russia's economic crisis with a view to destroying its nuclear capability.

Despite editorials around the world expressing alarm about the deteriorating political situation in Russia (including an especially strong one in Asahi Shimbun of Tokyo), Le Figaro of Paris led Friday with French President Jacques Chirac declaring after talks in the Kremlin that he doesn't believe that Russia will withdraw from the Kosovo peace process and that he expects the next few days to show "that things are moving in the right direction, that of peace."
